//: The grammar and punctuation mistakes are there on purpose 9/10 times. Keep in mind that those notes are supposed to be written by primary-school-level children.

text.text: "Dad said he was going to get groceries two days ago.  he didnt come home yet.  he told me to stay inside the shelter but im getting scared.  i think i remember where the grocery store is."
"i calld 911 but no one was there"
"My window lit up at midnight.  I tried seeing what it was but it broke.  My ears hurt."
"I want mom’s pancakes"
"Uncle buried ms Carmichael after she got sick but she's not in the backyard anymore.  Uncle isn't home either."
"Cooper killed the neighbors cat today.  dad shoot him.  He was not in the backyart when we came home."
"Today I saw a butterfly the size of my head"
"I miss mom and dad.  Where is everyone?"
"DaIsy gOT eaTTEN by a giant roa… (the rest of the note is just unreadable smudges)"
"Mommy, where are you?  I miss you…"
"Daddy, where are you?  I'm scared..."
"I'm hungry"
"I want to play with jimmy, why did daddy said to get away from him?"
"Daddy hasn't wake up yet…"
"Daddy said we are going on an adventure!"
"Katty is feeling bad, mommy hasn't returned"
"I want to see mommy"
"I want to see daddy"
"I feel cold…"
"I want a hug"
"I saw a huge mushroom yesterday.  I feel itchy."
"I don't want to leave the house, but I'm hungry…"
"I went and keeped only necesary items like dad told me"
"Mommy cried the other day…  I don't want to be here anymore."
"Uncle Tim said we are going on a trip, but I just want to see daddy."
"dear diary. mr pendanski showed me how to boil water today.  he told me it stopps it from making us sick like ma and pa got sick."
